TechCrunch@TechCrunch Google will reimburse developers $90 million to settle a lawsuit over Play Store earnings by @indianidle

Google will reimburse developers $90 million to settle a lawsuit over Play Store earnings

Google said Thursday it will pay $90 million to settle a lawsuit with US developers that accused Google of abusing its power of app distribution and charging an unfair fee of 30% for app purchases and in-app purchases made through the Play Store.
